item.title: The world's first blockchain smartphone is in development
item.description:
The world's first blockchain smartphone is in development

According to Sirin, all Finney devices (there's an all-in-one PC coming, too) will form an independent blockchain network powered by IOTA's Tangle technology. The network will operate without centralized backbones or mining centers cluttering up the transaction process, using the SRN token as its default currency (only SRN token holders will be able to purchase the device).

item.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Co-Authors Plan for 'Iterative' ICO Protocol - CoinDesk
item.description:
Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Co-Authors Plan for 'Iterative' ICO Protocol - CoinDesk

The protocol, which would seek to produce an "equilibrium" between capped and uncapped token sales, represents a collaborative effort between ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin and developer Jason Teutsch, the creator of smart contract scalability project TrueBit. In the white paper, released today, the authors detail a system by which an ICO could respond to the actions of buyers.

item.title: The Ultimate List of ICO Resources - CoinDesk
item.description:
The Ultimate List of ICO Resources - CoinDesk

William Mougayar is the author of "The Business Blockchain" and a board advisor to, and investor in, various blockchain projects and startups (see: disclosures). On 25th May, 2017, he is organizing the Token Summit in New York, a one-day event discussing in-depth the token economy.

,

Yet another ultimate list of ICO resources

item.title: New SEC Cyber Unit to Police ICOs and Other DLT 'Violations' - CoinDesk
item.description:
New SEC Cyber Unit to Police ICOs and Other DLT 'Violations' - CoinDesk

The SEC will target violations involving distributed ledger technology and initial coin offerings (ICOs) as part of a new effort to fight cybercrime. Announced late Monday, the unit will go after "misconduct perpetrated using the dark web," where bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are used to pay for illicit goods, the SEC said.

item.title: Digital currency reading list - Dan Romero - Medium
item.description:
Digital currency reading list - Dan Romero - Medium

Inspired by Chris Dixon's "Crypto token roundup". "Digital currency reading list" is published by Dan Romero

item.title: Blockchain and Smart Contracts Will Eat Online Marketplaces
item.description:
Blockchain and Smart Contracts Will Eat Online Marketplaces

A few months ago I wrote a piece called What Kind of Marketplace Are You Building? It covered the structural differences between the main types of marketplaces. In this follow-up post, I'd like to address some external factors that could impact the model in the long run.

item.title: Crypto-Mania Grips Hong Kong as City Looks Beyond Banking
item.description:
Crypto-Mania Grips Hong Kong as City Looks Beyond Banking

In the mid-1990s, Johnson Leung embarked on a career in shipping. In the early 2000s, he moved to finance. And now, he runs a Hong Kong startup that aims to improve how container ships are booked using blockchain technology. Many in Hong Kong hope the city can make a similar leap.

item.title: China blocks WhatsApp
item.description:
China blocks WhatsApp

China has blocked WhatsApp, security experts confirmed today . Over the past few months, WhatsApp has experienced brief disruptions to service, with users unable to send video chats or photos. Now, even text messages are completely blocked, according to Nadim Kobeissi, an applied cryptographer at Symbolic Software, a Paris-based research firm that also monitors digital censorship in China.
